page.title: 20Ferreting
page.content:
Not many people on the Island go ferreting any more but those who do usually go down the quarries or the bramble bushes. The people normally take dogs as well as their ferrets because if the ferret decides that he wants to stay down the bunny hole and eat it then the dog has to chase him out. The ferreters catch the bunnies by putting nets over every burrow which might contain a bunny. Then they send the ferret down one of the holes and they wait to see what comes out. Sometimes the bunny jumps clean over the net and when that happens they send the dog chasing after it but they usually lose the bunny.
Stacey Cooper aged 14.
